TITLE: Treasury Secretary Yellen says only uninsured deposits at banks deemed a systemic risk will be protected
SUMMARY: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen sought to reassure markets and lawmakers that the government will protect U.S. bank deposits amid a rash of bank failures.

TITLE: Silicon Valley Bank ex-CEO backed Big Tech lobbying groups that targeted Dodd Frank, sought corporate tax cuts
SUMMARY: Silicon Valley Bank ex-CEO Greg Becker backed two lobbying groups financed by tech giants as they targeted Dodd Frank and the corporate tax rate.

TITLE: Ex-fugitive in fraud scheme tied to $100 million NJ deli willing to pay millions for bail
SUMMARY: Peter Coker Jr. is charged with his father and another man over alleged stock fraud involving a small town New Jersey deli.

TITLE: Trump extends lead over DeSantis in new poll of possible GOP primary field
SUMMARY: DeSantis, who has not yet announced his widely expected presidential campaign, has recently come under fire from Trump and other presidential contenders.

TITLE: Trump super PAC accuses Ron DeSantis of 'shadow' presidential bid in ethics complaint
SUMMARY: If DeSantis violated Florida ethics laws, he should face the "severe penalties" including ballot disqualification, the pro-Trump super PAC argued.

TITLE: DOJ charges Chinese businessman Guo Wengui, associate of Steve Bannon, in $1 billion fraud
SUMMARY: Prosecutors accused Guo Wengui, an associate of former Trump White House advisor Steve Bannon, of a large conspiracy that duped his online followers.

TITLE: Apple, Amazon, Google will likely get a reprieve from GOP-controlled House on antitrust legislation
SUMMARY: House Republican leadership likely won't focus on antitrust legislation, giving a key victory to the tech giants of Google, Amazon and Apple.

TITLE: Pfizer will have to pay rebates to Medicare for five drugs under Biden plan to lower Rx costs
SUMMARY: Five of Pfizer's drugs will cost less for Medicare recipients starting next month as part of President Joe Biden's plan to lower prescription drug cost.

TITLE: Top Senate Democrats press DOJ, SEC to investigate whether Silicon Valley Bank executives broke any laws
SUMMARY: California bank regulators shuttered SVB on Friday and the FDIC set up an intermediary bank to take over the bank's insured deposits.

TITLE: Warren unveils bill to repeal Trump-era bank deregulation she says led to SVB, Signature collapses
SUMMARY: The bill would lower the asset threshold for banks to qualify for added oversight, which was raised to $250 billion in a 2018 Republican deregulation bill.

TITLE: Chuck Schumer gives campaign donations from Silicon Valley Bank's ex-CEO, PAC to charity
SUMMARY: The Senate Majority Leader Schumer received campaign donations from both the CEO and political action committee of shuttered Silicon Valley Bank.

TITLE: Ex-fugitive in $100 million New Jersey deli case leaves Thailand for U.S. court hearing
SUMMARY: Three men are charged with alleged stock manipulation of Hometown International, which owned just a money-losing New Jersey deli.

TITLE: Biden announces new plans to curb gun violence, months after Lunar New Year mass shooting
SUMMARY: Though President Joe Biden signed the first major gun legislation passed in nearly 30 years last summer, he said it did not go as far as he'd like.

TITLE: Russian jet collides with, downs U.S. drone over Black Sea
SUMMARY: The U.S. called the downing of the drone by a Russian jet part of a pattern of reckless behavior by Russia.

TITLE: Rep. George Santos files 2024 statement of candidacy — but it doesn't mean he's running for reelection
SUMMARY: Santos has been denounced by some Republicans and embroiled in a flurry of investigations after admitting he lied about his biography on the campaign trail.

TITLE: Citing 'death threats,' Texas judge asked attorneys to keep news of hearing on legality of abortion pill quiet
SUMMARY: Federal Judge Matthew Kacsmaryk asked attorneys in a pivotal case over the abortion pill mifepristone to not disclose a key hearing set for Wednesday.

TITLE: Sen. Warren urges Fed Chair Powell to recuse himself from review of Silicon Valley Bank collapse
SUMMARY: Sen. Elizabeth Warren accused Fed Chair Jerome Powell of allowing the SVB debacle to happen through lax oversight practices.

TITLE: The U.S. stock market keeps beating Europe in new listings. And it's no fluke
SUMMARY: There are two main reasons why U.S. stock markets are more attractive for new listings, analysts said.

TITLE: Australia to receive nuclear-powered submarines under agreement with U.S., UK
SUMMARY: U.S. President Joe Biden, U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese came to the agreement at a meeting in San Diego, Calif.

TITLE: Former Trump lawyer Michael Cohen testifies to grand jury for three hours, will return Wednesday
SUMMARY: A 2016 hush-money payment to porn star Stormy Daniels is the focus of a New York criminal probe of former President Donald Trump.

TITLE: GOP presidential contenders cast blame for Silicon Valley Bank collapse
SUMMARY: While Trump slammed Biden and Democrats, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis suggested that diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives were to blame for SVB's failure.

TITLE: 'That's how capitalism works,' Biden says of SVB, Signature Bank investors who lost money in failed banks
SUMMARY: "Investors in the banks will not be protected," Biden said. "They knowingly took a risk and when the risk didn't pay off, the investors lose their money."

TITLE: Italy's own version of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is shaking up politics in Rome
SUMMARY: Elly Schlein was elected as the leader of the center-left party Partito Democratico — the first female to get the job.

TITLE: Wall Street — not taxpayers — will pay for the SVB and Signature deposit relief plans
SUMMARY: The funds to reimburse depositors will be paid out of the Deposit Insurance Fund, which is made up of quarterly fees assessed on financial institutions.

TITLE: Show me the money: The highest revenue raising taxes in Biden's proposed budget
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden released his 2024 budget plan Thursday which promises to cut the deficit by $3 trillion over the next decade.

TITLE: Op-ed: Biden's American Rescue Plan props up underserved communities with jobs, education
SUMMARY: We approach both the second anniversary of the $1.9 trillion American Rescue Plan on Saturday — and the 55th anniversary of Dr. Martin Luther King's speech.

TITLE: Former Trump lawyer Michael Cohen to testify to grand jury in Stormy Daniels payoff probe
SUMMARY: If Donald Trump is charged in connection with a hush money payment to porn star Stormy Daniels, he will be the first U.S. president to face criminal charges.

TITLE: DeSantis first-week memoir sales far outpace books by Trump, Pence, Clinton and Obama
SUMMARY: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis' memoir outpaces first-week sales of titles by Donald Trump, Barack Obama, Hillary Clinton, Mike Pence, Nikki Haley and Mike Pompeo.

TITLE: House conservatives issue new list of demands that could upend debt ceiling talks
SUMMARY: The House Freedom Caucus demanded drastic federal budget cuts, work requirements for Medicaid and an end to "federal regulations" on domestic energy production.

TITLE: North Carolina lawmakers intervene to defend abortion pill restrictions in case testing FDA power
SUMMARY: A North Carolina physician sued the state in January to block its restrictions on mifepristone because they go beyond FDA regulations.
